data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Fogarty Creek, Oregon, USA (FC30)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Fogarty Creek, Oregon, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using StowAway XTI Temperature Loggers (Onset Computer Corp. XTI32-05+37) beginning 2002-05-13. The instrument depth was 021 meters, in an overall water depth of 25 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
